EmailTemplate.subject: TCS Summer Kick Off 2016 - got your ticket yet?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}!
Have you heard the latest?
We are releasing information on some of the charities coming to help you launch your career.
DON'T MISS OUT - get your ticket to the LAST BIG EVENT of the year!
Monday 1st August is our Summer Kick Off 2016! 12:00 - 17:30 at Big Creative Education, E17 5SD
#Reunite #InspireYourCareer #MakeADifference with us...
Does International Development sound exciting to you? One of our mystery charities will be telling you all they know about how to get involved in helping the world become a better place. Their values are:
WE ARE BRAVE WE PROVE THAT YOUNG PEOPLE CAN WE LISTEN AND LEARN WE ARE PROUD TO CARRY THE BANNER FOR YOUTH-LED DEVELOPMENT
Can you figure out who it is?
More charity partners will be revealed soon!
And remember this is your last chance to also Reunite with lots of your NCS friends in a big fun event! So if you'd like to come...
#Reunite
#InspireYourCareer
#MakeADifference
with us...
SIGN UP FOR YOUR FREE TICKET HERE!
